import React, { Component } from 'react'; import FlipMove from 'react-flip-move'; class QuienPago extends Component { render() { const payPeopleList = this.props.payPeople.map((person) =>

  • {person.name}

    {person.type}

    ${person.payed}

    remove_circle_outline
    • ); const total = this.props.payPeople.reduce((a, b) => a + b.payed, 0); return(

    Quién pagó?

    Puso para
    Gastó
      {payPeopleList}
    • Total ${total}
    ); } } export default QuienPago;
